id: The Superconnector Engine | Notion Networking Dashboard Template
name: The Superconnector Engine | Notion Networking Dashboard Template
description: Hello, SuperconnectorsBuild your own personalised network with this Notion template that embraces the power of forms, matches and automated emails.For the automations in this template to work, you will need a paid Notion account and Gmail.
